publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6636.1 John Lamont: The Independent Review of Sheriff and Jury Procedureâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-6636) in the name of Kenny MacAskill, insert at end ", and further recognises that, with constraints on the public expenditure, it is vital to ensure that justice continues to be delivered swiftly and in a cost effective manner."
